item.title: A Day at the L.A. Zoo
item.description:
A Day at the L.A. Zoo

Nothing better than spending time with my family at the zoo. Having a son that loves animals the joy that he has from visiting the zoo is unmatched.

item.title: Santa Monica
item.description:
Santa Monica

Sunny Southern California is a popular tourist destination. I just call it home. Having lived in Los Angeles for virtually my entire life its great to take time and appreciate the fortunate life that I have.

item.title: Liam 1st Christmas
item.description:
Liam 1st Christmas

Some of my fondest memories are spending time with my family. My son's first christmas was special for us all and produced some pictures I will look back on for years to come.

item.title: Film News: Announcing JCH StreetPan 400 film! - Japan Camera Hunter
item.description:
Film News: Announcing JCH StreetPan 400 film! - Japan Camera Hunter

Film News: Announcing JCH StreetPan 400 film! Today is my birthday, so what better present could I give to myself and to you too than some film news that is really awesome! Introducing to you my very own brand of film, JCH StreetPan 400!

item.title: "Failing to prepare is preparing to fail" - John Wooden
item.description:
"Failing to prepare is preparing to fail" - John Wooden

Originally said by Benjamin Franklin, later adapted by John Wooden

item.title: Leica M262 Review
item.description:
Leica M262 Review

Another fun Kai Leica review, this time with the newly introduced simpler M240 I mean M262. Whatever your opinion of Leica is, we can all love Kai.

item.title: LensRental Comparing the Leica Monochrom to a Sony a7R II
item.description:
LensRental Comparing the Leica Monochrom to a Sony a7R II

What Is A Monochrome Sensor And Why Does It Exist? Leica cameras have always been exciting to me. I think it's mostly because of how expensive they are. Holding and using something incredibly out of my budget gives the shooting experience a little extra magic.

item.title: My Favorite Sites For Leica Info
item.description:
My Favorite Sites For Leica Info

When getting into Leica the internet is filled with opinions. Shockingly there are quite a few Leica haters along with those that overly praise the brand. Below I have listed my favorite Leica sites.

item.title: "Photographers deal in things which are continually vanishing and when they have vanished there is no contrivance on earth which can make them come back again." -Henri Cartier-Bresson
item.description:
"Photographers deal in things which are continually vanishing and when they have vanished there is no contrivance on earth which can make them come back again." -Henri Cartier-Bresson

The great Henri Cartier-Bresson
